item.title: Trump says no more Venezuelan oil or money to go to Cuba, pushes for deal
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Cuba should strike a deal with Washington, ramping up pressure on the longtime U.S. nemesis.

item.title: Confronting protests, Iran vows to strike back if the U.S. attacks
item.description: Tehran on Sunday threatened to retaliate against Israel and U.S. bases in the event of U.S. strikes on Iran.

item.title: U.S. may lift more Venezuela sanctions next week, Bessent says
item.description: Bessent said almost $5 billion worth of Venezuela's frozen IMF Special Drawing Rights assets could be deployed to help rebuild the country's economy.

item.title: Trump seeks to stop courts, creditors from seizing Venezuelan oil revenue in the U.S.
item.description: Any use of judicial process against the funds will interfere with efforts to "ensure economic and political stability in Venezuela," the order says.

item.title: Congress is debating the possible consequences for ICE and even Noem after Renee Good's killing
item.description: Lawmakers are considering actions such as a full investigation into Renee Good's shooting death to the impeachment of Homeland Security Secretary Kris...
